{{Quote|My little birds are everywhere.|Varys|Lord Snow}}
'''Little birds''' are the members of a network of spies and informants in the service of [[Varys]], the [[Master of Whisperers]] on the [[small council]] of the [[Red Keep]]. Many of Varys' "little birds" are seemingly innocuous street children.

Varys' network spans not only the length and breadth of Westeros, but also [[Essos]] as far east as [[Vaes Dothrak]] and possibly even [[Qarth]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, at least some of Varys' "little birds" have had their tongues cut out (though Varys himself did not cut them out).
